markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hobgoblin Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1025) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent. You become trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) and [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4). For each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Hobgoblin [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Hobgoblin Lore
